column4: I just put a new hard drive into my computer. When I start the computer, it's significantly louder than the other hard drive that was already in the computer. What can I use in Ubuntu that might help me diagnose the hard drive and see if the noise levels are a concern or not?
smartmontools offer lot's of reporting, else get a live tool from the vendor
I'll give that a try. Thanks
